item.title: Get Facebook Reaction data using Graph API
item.description: Facebook Enhances Everyone’s Like With Love, Haha, Wow, Sad, Angry Buttons. For example, there are two reactions in the post 778979332230227: Your can use Facebook Graph API - Reading Reactions to get the reactions data. Note: The API version must be 2.6 or higher. You also can get all reactions count of one post in single Graph API request:
